scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules doc dist && npm cache clean
scripts.compile:vendor: rollup -c rollup.config.vendor.js && tsc --out ./dist/vendor.js --target es5 --allowJs dist/vendor.es2015.js || true
scripts.compile:src: rollup -c rollup.config.js && tsc --out ./dist/bundle.js --target es5 --allowJs dist/bundle.es2015.js || true
scripts.compile:sass: npm run compile:sass-global && npm run compile:sass-src
scripts.compile:sass-prod: npm run compile:sass-global-prod && npm run compile:sass-src-prod
scripts.compile:sass-global: node-sass --quiet --sourceComments --include-path scss src/style/ -o dist/style/ && npm run compile:css-global
scripts.compile:sass-src: node-sass --quiet --sourceComments --include-path scss -r src/app/ -o src/app/ && npm run compile:css-src && npm run compile:src
scripts.compile:sass-global-prod: node-sass --quiet --include-path scss src/style/ -o dist/style/ && npm run compile:css-global-prod
scripts.compile:sass-src-prod: node-sass --quiet --include-path scss -r src/app/ -o src/app/ && npm run compile:css-src-prod && npm run compile:src
scripts.build:clean: rimraf dist && npm run copy:public && npm run copy:dep && npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:vendor && npm run compile:src
scripts.build:dev: npm run copy:public && npm run copy:dep && npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:src
scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist && npm run copy:public && npm run copy:dep && npm run compile:sass-prod && npm run compile:vendor && npm run compile:src && npm run uglify:vendor && npm run uglify:src
scripts.build:src: npm run lint && npm run compile:src
scripts.ci: npm run e2e && npm run test
